Key Match Events: South Africa lost the crucial make or break match at the Adelaide Oval to Netherlands by 13 runs.
Proteas had won the toss and bowled first. Barring Anrich Nortje, every other bowler went for runs.
Netherlands batted fiercely with opener Myburgh slamming 37 off 30 balls.
Tom Cooper gave the innings the needed impetus with a quick-fire 35.
Ackermann changed the complexion of the match with 41 off 26.
Chasing 159, South Africa kept on losing timely wickets and at one stage were 39/2.
David Miller scored run a ball 17.
Aiden Markram and Heinrich Klaasen's uninspiring batting reduced the Proteas to 113/6.
South Africa eventually lost the match by 13 runs.
Last ball was hit for four by Anrich Nortje, but that was not enough.
David Miller and Heinrich Klaasen's dismissals were pivotal moments.
South Africa choked true to their nature, losing to Netherlands by 13 runs.
Netherlands now qualify for the 2024 T20 World Cup.
South Africa's loss meant India are through to the semi-final.
Pakistan and Bangladesh are both in contention for the final spot in the last four.
Pre-Game Insights: A win would have been enough for South Africa to become the first team from Group 2 and third overall to progress to the semifinals of the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup 2022.
The Temba Bavuma-led South Africa were the clear favourites but in the unlikely scenario of their defeat, they would have to pack their bags for home.
Netherlands were currently languishing at the bottom of the pile and were already out of the race.
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa are going home and this would be demoralising; they were one of the favourites.
South Africa choked true to their nature, meanwhile what a match for Netherlands. They have shown amazing fight to beat South Africa by 13 runs.
South Africa lose the match by 13 runs which means India are through to semi-final. Meanwhile Pakistan and Bangladesh both are in contention.
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa vs Netherlands T20 World Cup match was played at the Adelaide Oval.
South Africa vs Netherlands T20 World Cup match was televised on Star Sports Network in India.
South Africa vs Netherlands T20 World Cup match was streamed live on Disney+ Hotstar.
Netherlands now qualify for the 2024 T20 World Cup. No qualifiers for the Dutch.
